--gcp.help: Path to the files containing the ground control points used for georeferencing. Default: None

--max-concurrency.help: The maximum number of cores to use in processing. Default: 4

--resize-to.help: Scale image width for tie-point extraction. Default: 800

--zoom.help: The level of DEM construction. 4 means 4x native GSD. Default: 4 Values: 1, 2, 4, 8

--matcher-distance.help: Distance threshold in meters to find pre-matching images based on GPS exif data.

--multi-scale.help: Uses an image file pair based multi-scale tie-point generation routine similar to Photoscan.

--remove-ortho-tiles.help: Remove every other ortho tile. Speeds up ortho creation and radiometric equalization.

--camera-cloud.help: Creates a sparse point cloud with camera positions.

--image-footprint.help: Creates a point cloud and geojson with image footprints.

--ccd-width.help: The CCD sensor width in millimeters (mm). Example: 6.17

--ccd-height.help: The CCD sensor height in millimeters (mm). Example: 4.55

-h.help: show this help message and exit
